accessResourceTemplates.template:
spec:
  entryPoints:
    - websecure
  routes:
    - match: "Host(`example.com`) && PathPrefix(`/workspaces/{{ .Workspace.Namespace }}/{{ .Workspace.Name }}/`)"
      kind: Rule
      priority: 100
      services:
        - name: "{{ .Service.Name }}"
          namespace: "{{ .Service.Namespace }}"
          port: 8888
